content_1: Mongolia. An outbreak of H5N1 bird flu in migratory whooper swans has been reported in the Ugii-nuur soum (district) of Arkhangai. Nine of the swans died and one was culled as a result of the outbreak that began on May 22.
content_2: √çndia. In the Uttar Dinajpur district of West Bengal twenty rural backyard poultry died in an outbreak that began on May 20. All domestic poultry in a 3km radius have been culled and the owners have been compensated. Within a 10km radius all poultry markets have been closed and premises have been disinfected.
